newsitem.title: USA: PRESS DIGEST - New York Times business - Oct 22.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - New York Times business - Oct 22.

text.p: NEW YORK, Oct 22 - The New York Times reported the following business stories in its Tuesday edition:
- Microsoft Corp reported fiscal first-quarter earnings that were higher than estimates made by Wall Street analysts with per share profit at $0.95.
- IBM Corp reported solid third-quarter earnings due to good computer hardware sales and services with per share earnings at $2.45.
- The private weather forecast industry is becoming big business as brokerage firms join airlines, truckers and farmers in seeking better forecasts.
